text: Gunther Schuller (November 22, 1925June 21, 2015) was an American composer, conductor, horn player, author, historian, and jazz musician. He was born in New York City. Schuller died on June 21, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts from leukemia, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Pro Arte biography of Gunther Schuller *GM Recordings Gunther Schuller's recording label *Art of the States: Gunther Schuller Phantasmata (1989) *http://arts.endow.gov/av/video/2008jazzpanel/index.html *Extensive Gunther Schuller interview *Two interviews with Gunther Schuller by Bruce Duffie (May 8, 1981 & October 15, 1988) Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:American historians Category:American composers Category:American conductors Category:American jazz musicians Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Writers from New York City
title: Gunther Schuller
